entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle changing to a few flurries or rain showers after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
